headline: Outseer Appoints Chief Revenue Officer to Lead Growing Global Sales Organization
summary: LONDON, December 16, 2025--Outseer, a global leader in all-cause digital fraud prevention for financial institutions, today announced the appointment of Shane Cumming as Chief Revenue Officer (CRO). With more than two decades of experience scaling global revenue organizations, Cumming will lead Outseer’s worldwide sales as the company delivers breakthrough innovations in scam prevention, next-generation behavioral biometrics, and money mule detection to a growing market.

headline: Is Kyndryl Holdings Inc. (KD) One of the Best Affordable AI Stocks to Buy Now?
summary: Kyndryl Holdings Inc. (NYSE:KD) is one of the best affordable AI stocks to buy now.
